# Copilot Instructions

## General Guidelines
- This is a CakePHP Version: 5.2.5 application.
- Line endings: LF
- The platform should use a convivial tone.
- All text is in English, use PHP function __().
- If French translation is asked, "tutoiement" should be used.

## Layout Instructions
- Ensure that the checkbox and label stay on the same line in the members layout.
